K10D0118_H0121:451b-1: a'arya ratna koti n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0118_H0121:451b-3: 'phags pa rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0118_H0121:451b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0118_H0121:451b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0118_H0121:451b-6: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi
K10D0118_H0121:451b-7: phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i
K10D0118_H0121:451b-8: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig
K10D0118_H0121:451b-9: tu bzhugs te / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
K10D0118_H0121:451b-10: gyur pa mtshan mo srod la bcom ldan 'das kyi
K10D0118_H0121:451b-11: bzhugs khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
K10D0118_H0121:451b-12: bzhugs khang gi sgo drung na 'greng ste bcom ldan
K10D0118_H0121:452a-0: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po @452a *//
K10D0118_H0121:452a-1: che'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so //
K10D0118_H0121:452a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang mkhyen bzhin
K10D0118_H0121:452a-3: du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas 'jam dpal
K10D0118_H0121:452a-4: gzhon nur gyur pa sgo na 'dug pa gzigs so
K10D0118_H0121:452a-5: // gzigs nas kyang 'jam dpal khyod nang du shog ces de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0118_H0121:452a-9: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi
K10D0118_H0121:452a-10: ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar
K10D0118_H0121:452a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'greng ngo //
K10D0118_H0121:452a-13: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gcig tu 'greng ba dang /
K10D0118_H0121:452a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis stan la 'dug ces gnang ba mdzad do //
K10D0118_H0121:452a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa /
K10D0118_H0121:452a-16: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
K10D0118_H0121:452a-17: mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'dug go
K10D0118_H0121:452a-18: / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la
K10D0118_H0121:452a-19: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol
K10D0118_H0121:452a-21: da gdod ting nge 'dzin gang gis bzhugs bzhugs pa las bzhengs lags /
K10D0118_H0121:452a-22: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:452a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0118_H0121:452b-0: rin po che'i @452b mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
K10D0118_H0121:452b-1: ting nge 'dzin des nga da gdod gnas gnas pa las langs so //
K10D0118_H0121:452b-4: ci'i slad du de la rin po che'i mtha' zhes bgyi lags /
K10D0118_H0121:452b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0118_H0121:452b-9: nor bu rin po che shin tu dag cing shin
K10D0118_H0121:452b-10: tu byi dor byas pa sa phyogs mnyam pa la
K10D0118_H0121:452b-11: bzhag na de gang dang gang kho nar bzhag pa
K10D0118_H0121:452b-12: de dang der rin po che bye ba gnas par
K10D0118_H0121:452b-14: de bzhin du nga ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas shar phyogs su bltas te /
K10D0118_H0121:452b-15: shar phyogs su bltas na ngas 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0118_H0121:452b-16: dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin
K10D0118_H0121:452b-17: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0118_H0121:452b-18: sangs rgyas chos ston cing bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo
K10D0118_H0121:452b-19: // de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K10D0118_H0121:452b-23: steng nas phyogs bcu'i bar du bltas na ngas 'jig
K10D0118_H0121:452b-24: rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na de
K10D0118_H0121:452b-25: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0118_H0121:452b-26: pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston cing bzhugs pa dag mthong
K10D0118_H0121:452b-28: ngas ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang yang
K10D0118_H0121:452b-29: dag pa'i mtha' ma yin pa'i chos de gang yang
K10D0118_H0121:452b-30: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
K10D0118_H0121:452b-32: yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya 'di ngas phyag rgyar bzhag ste /
K10D0118_H0121:452b-33: dad pa can gyi rigs kyi bu rnams dang /
K10D0118_H0121:453a-0: rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis phyag @453a *//
K10D0118_H0121:453a-1: rgya 'di la spyad na spobs pa mi chod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10D0118_H0121:453a-7: 'jam dpal khyod spobs par gyis shig /
K10D0118_H0121:453a-11: nor bu rin po che de nyid ngos gang dang
K10D0118_H0121:453a-12: gang kho nas phab ste bzhag pa'i rin po che'i
K10D0118_H0121:453a-13: ngos de dang de kho na 'bab cing gnas par
K10D0118_H0121:453a-15: de bzhin du chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' kho nas gnas lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:453a-17: 'jam dpal khyod kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' shes sam /
K10D0118_H0121:453a-23: 'o na yang dag pa'i mtha' gang na 'dug /
K10D0118_H0121:453a-26: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni bdag gi mtha' gang na mchis pa de na mchis lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:453a-27: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni so so'i skye bo'i chos
K10D0118_H0121:453a-28: rnams gang na ma mchis pa de na mchis lags
K10D0118_H0121:453a-29: so // yang dag pa'i mtha' ni las sam /
K10D0118_H0121:453a-30: rnam par smin pa'ang ma lags la chos thams cad kyi mtha' yang de kho na lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:453a-32: gang dag de ltar mos pa de dag ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba mchis lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:453a-33: gang dag gang las kyang grol ba ma mchis pa
K10D0118_H0121:453b-0: de dag ni log pa las rnam par @453b grol
K10D0118_H0121:453b-1: ba lags so // gang dag log pa las rnam
K10D0118_H0121:453b-2: par grol ba de dag ni yang dag par rnam
K10D0118_H0121:453b-4: gang dag yang dag par rnam par grol pa de
K10D0118_H0121:453b-5: dag ni spyod yul ma lags pa la zhugs pa
K10D0118_H0121:453b-6: lags so // gang dag spyod yul ma lags pa
K10D0118_H0121:453b-7: la zhugs pa de dag ni yang dag par zhugs
K10D0118_H0121:453b-8: lags so // pa lags so // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0118_H0121:453b-10: spyod yul ma lags pa zhes bgyi ba ni spyod yul des bgyis lags pa ste /
K10D0118_H0121:453b-11: de'i slad du spyod yul ma lags pa zhes 'dogs lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:453b-14: spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dvags yin /
K10D0118_H0121:453b-17: spyod yul ma lags pa zhes bgyi ba de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig bla dvags lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:453b-20: lam sgom pa zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dvags yin /
K10D0118_H0121:453b-23: lam bsgom pa zhes bgyi ba de ni lam sgom
K10D0118_H0121:453b-24: pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dvags lags so; ;bka'
K10D0118_H0121:453b-25: stsal pa / 'jam dpal khyod las dang po pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang /
K10D0118_H0121:453b-26: rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chos ji ltar ston /
K10D0118_H0121:453b-29: bdag ni las dang po po'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang /
K10D0118_H0121:453b-30: rigs kyi bu mo rnams la 'jig tshogs dor du ma mchis par chos ston lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:454a-1: rnams spang du ma mchis par chos ston pa lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:454a-2: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0118_H0121:454a-4: chos 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de
K10D0118_H0121:454a-5: ni spang bar rdo mi thogs pa'i slad du lags
K10D0118_H0121:454a-8: 'jig tshogs kun 'byung ba spong bar 'tshal ba de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' spong bar bas te /
K10D0118_H0121:454a-10: bdag ni las dang po pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang /
K10D0118_H0121:454a-11: rigs kyi bu mo rnams la mngon par zhen pa
K10D0118_H0121:454a-12: ma mchis pa'i tshul gyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
K10D0118_H0121:454a-14: mngon sum du mi bgyi ba dang /
K10D0118_H0121:454a-15: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams lhag par mi dmigs pa'ang /
K10D0118_H0121:454a-16: spang bar mi bgyi ba de lta bur chos ston lags na /
K10D0118_H0121:454a-17: gdul ba las dang po pa rnams la bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos ston par mdzad lags /
K10D0118_H0121:454a-20: nga ni gzugs rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:454a-21: skye ba med bar chos ston to //
K10D0118_H0121:454a-25: rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa med pa dan /g skye ba med par chos ston to //
K10D0118_H0121:454a-28: gti mug rnams rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:454a-30: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnams kyang thob pa med par chos ston to //
K10D0118_H0121:454b-0: ngas ni 'di ltar @454b chos gang yang ma bshig
K10D0118_H0121:454b-1: ma bskyed pa de ltar bla na med pa yang
K10D0118_H0121:454b-2: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
K10D0118_H0121:454b-4: sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bla dvags lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:454b-7: ma 'dres pa la thug pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
K10D0118_H0121:454b-8: gang dag yin pa de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings
K10D0118_H0121:454b-9: kho na yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
K10D0118_H0121:454b-10: ngas ni chos kyi dbyings la 'di lta ste /
K10D0118_H0121:454b-11: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sam /
K10D0118_H0121:454b-12: dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams sam /
K10D0118_H0121:454b-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam /
K10D0118_H0121:454b-14: sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams kyang rung ste /
K10D0118_H0121:454b-15: de dag tha dad par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
K10D0118_H0121:454b-18: dbyings de la ni bye brag med de /
K10D0118_H0121:454b-21: chos kyi dbyings ni ma 'dres pa'i dbyings so //
K10D0118_H0121:454b-25: chu klung ming tha dad pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:454b-26: kha dog tha dad pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:454b-27: ro tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i nang du bab pa rnams la ni 'di lta ste /
K10D0118_H0121:454b-30: ya mu na'o zhes bye brag tu dbye ba'am tha dad du byar mi nus so //
K10D0118_H0121:454b-32: de bzhin du ming tha dad pa'i chos rnams kyang
K10D0118_H0121:454b-33: chos kyi dbyings la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i
K10D0118_H0121:455a-1: chos rnams so zhes tha dad par gdags par mi nus so //
K10D0118_H0121:455a-5: 'bru'i phung po sna tshogs la ni 'di ni 'bru che ge mo zhig gi phung po'o //
K10D0118_H0121:455a-6: 'di ni che ge mo zhig go zhes gdags su
K10D0118_H0121:455a-7: yod pa bzhin du chos kyi dbyings la ni 'di
K10D0118_H0121:455a-8: dag so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so zhe'am /
K10D0118_H0121:455a-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes tha dad par gdags par mi nus so //
K10D0118_H0121:455a-16: 'bru'i phung po sna tshogs la ni 'bru che ge mo zhig gi phung po'o //
K10D0118_H0121:455a-17: 'di ni che ge mo zhig go zhes gdags su
K10D0118_H0121:455a-18: yod pa bzhin du chos kyi dbyings la ni 'di
K10D0118_H0121:455a-19: dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so //
K10D0118_H0121:455a-20: 'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams so //
K10D0118_H0121:455a-21: 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so //
K10D0118_H0121:455a-22: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams so //
K10D0118_H0121:455a-23: 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes tha dad par gdags par mi nus so //
K10D0118_H0121:455a-26: ga ge mo zhig na 'dug go zhes de ltar bstan pa'am gdags par mi nus so //
K10D0118_H0121:455a-28: 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings ni bltar mi mthong zhing bstan du med de /
K10D0118_H0121:455a-29: gdags par bya ba ma yin zhing gdags pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0118_H0121:455b-0: 'gro ba 'di de @455b lta bu'i dbyings yin par
K10D0118_H0121:455b-1: ngas ji skad bstan pa la gal te mtshams med
K10D0118_H0121:455b-2: pa byed pa de ltar mos te /
K10D0118_H0121:455b-3: mtshams med pa'ang de lta bu'i dbyings yin par shes na /
K10D0118_H0121:455b-4: de kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0118_H0121:455b-7: mtshams med pa ni chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par mnyam pa'i phyir te /
K10D0118_H0121:455b-8: 'di ltar mtshams med pa'i dbyings dang /
K10D0118_H0121:455b-9: chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
K10D0118_H0121:455b-12: kun nas ldang pa mi dmigs so //
K10D0118_H0121:455b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:455b-14: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0118_H0121:455b-16: bdag gis kyang chos kyi dbyings ngan song du mchi ba'am /
K10D0118_H0121:455b-18: mya ngan las 'das par mchi bar ma mthong lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:455b-21: gal te la la zhig khyod la 'di skad du 'dri ste /
K10D0118_H0121:455b-22: khyod kyi ston pa 'gro ba drug dang ldan pa'i
K10D0118_H0121:455b-23: 'khor ba ji ltar 'dogs zhes de skad dris na
K10D0118_H0121:455b-24: 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad lan gdab /
K10D0118_H0121:455b-27: de skad du smras na bdag gis 'di skad du lan gdab par bgyi ste /
K10D0118_H0121:455b-29: mi gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du sems can dmyal ba'am /
K10D0118_H0121:456a-5: ji ltar g-yar lam rmi ba'i mis sna tshogs mthong
K10D0118_H0121:456a-6: yang g-yar lam sna tshogs ma mchis pa de bzhin
K10D0118_H0121:456a-7: du bdag gis 'gro ba tha dad pa bstan kyang
K10D0118_H0121:456a-8: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid tha dad pa
K10D0118_H0121:456a-9: gdags par rngo mi thogs te /
K10D0118_H0121:456a-11: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni de skad 'dri ba
K10D0118_H0121:456a-12: la de skad ces lan gdab par bgyi lags so
K10D0118_H0121:456a-14: de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams dang /
K10D0118_H0121:456a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10D0118_H0121:456a-17: nyan thos kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang
K10D0118_H0121:456a-18: tha dad par gdags par rngo mi thogs lags so
K10D0118_H0121:456a-20: de dag gis gnas pa dag kyang tha dad par gdags par rngo mi thogs lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:456a-21: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0118_H0121:456a-22: 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings las tha mi dad pa'i slad du lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:456a-25: rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che sna tshogs dung dang /
K10D0118_H0121:456a-27: byu ru la sogs pa tha ma dang /
K10D0118_H0121:456a-29: mchog rnams la 'di ni rin po che che ge mo zhig go /
K10D0118_H0121:456a-30: 'di ni rin po che che ge mo zhig go zhes tha dad par gdags su mchis lags kyi /
K10D0118_H0121:456a-31: chos kyi dbyings la ni de ltar tha dad par gdags pa'i rdo mi thogs la /
K10D0118_H0121:456b-0: gdags pa de la'ang tha dad par dbyer @456b ma mchis lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:456b-2: skye ba tha dad par gdags pa'i rdo mi thogs lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:456b-3: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0118_H0121:456b-7: rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:456b-8: chos kyi dbyings ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma lags /
K10D0118_H0121:456b-9: chos kyi dbyings ni 'dres pa ma lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:456b-10: chos kyi dbyings la ni gang dag spang bar bgyi ba'am /
K10D0118_H0121:456b-11: bskyed par bgyi ba'i chos de dag ma mchis lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:456b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du 'jam
K10D0118_H0121:456b-13: dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka'
K10D0118_H0121:456b-14: stsal to // 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings shes sam /
K10D0118_H0121:456b-16: gal te dmigs na bdag gis 'tshal lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:456b-19: 'jig rten gang la spyod shes sam /
K10D0118_H0121:456b-22: 'jig rten ni sgyu ma sprul pa'i mi gang kho na la spyod pa de la spyod lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:456b-24: 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas te /
K10D0118_H0121:456b-25: bdag gis ni gang bstan par bgyi ba'i 'jig rten gyi dngos po dang /
K10D0118_H0121:456b-26: 'jig rten gang la spyod pa'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:456b-27: bdag gis ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings las
K10D0118_H0121:456b-28: tha dad par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
K10D0118_H0121:456b-29: lags so // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0118_H0121:456b-30: ma mchis pa'i slad du lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:457a-1: ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gang la spyod ces bka' stsal pa de'ang /
K10D0118_H0121:457a-2: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de la ni 'chi 'pho dang /
K10D0118_H0121:457a-5: rab tu 'jig pa'ang ma mchis na gang la spyod par 'gyur lags /
K10D0118_H0121:457a-6: de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
K10D0118_H0121:457a-9: rnam par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gang
K10D0118_H0121:457a-10: lags pa de ni gtan ma mchis pa'i slad du
K10D0118_H0121:457a-11: skye ba'am 'gag pa ma mchis la /
K10D0118_H0121:457a-12: mtshan nyid gcig las mi 'da' ste /
K10D0118_H0121:457a-14: mtshan nyid gcig pa lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:457a-18: nga da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K10D0118_H0121:457a-19: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba
K10D0118_H0121:457a-20: 'di la khyod 'di snyam du 'di yongs su mya
K10D0118_H0121:457a-22: mi snang bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems sam /
K10D0118_H0121:457a-26: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0118_H0121:457a-27: chos kyi dbyings ni yang dag par grub pa ma lags pa'i slad du lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:457a-29: gal te chos kyi dbyings yang dag par grub pa
K10D0118_H0121:457a-30: zhig lags na ni de'i slad du de mi 'da'
K10D0118_H0121:457a-32: de la ni yang dag par grub pa mi dmigs pa ste /
K10D0118_H0121:457a-34: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ga la 'gyur lags /
K10D0118_H0121:457b-0: de @457b bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i dbyings lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:457b-1: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das ni skyes pa'ang ma lags /
K10D0118_H0121:457b-2: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:457b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0118_H0121:457b-5: 'o na khyod 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang+g'a'i
K10D0118_H0121:457b-6: klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag yongs su
K10D0118_H0121:457b-7: mya ngan 'das so zhes de la khyod ji ltar
K10D0118_H0121:457b-9: gal te de dag gi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mthong na ni bdag mos lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:457b-11: khyod so so'i skye bo shi ba rnams nyid mtshams sbyor bar 'dod dam /
K10D0118_H0121:457b-14: so so'i skye bo nyid kyang bdag gis yang dag
K10D0118_H0121:457b-15: par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na de'i nying
K10D0118_H0121:457b-16: mtshams sbyor ba lta ga la dmigs lags /
K10D0118_H0121:457b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa chos gnas par bzhed kyi /
K10D0118_H0121:457b-22: ci zhig las brtsams te spobs par bgyis lags /
K10D0118_H0121:457b-24: chos kyi dbyings las rtsoms shig /
K10D0118_H0121:457b-27: gang chos kyi dbyings ma lags pa'i chos de bdag
K10D0118_H0121:457b-28: gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so;
K10D0118_H0121:457b-30: mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams skrag par 'gyur ro //
K10D0118_H0121:458a-0: gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' skrag par 'gyur na ni de'i @458a *//
K10D0118_H0121:458a-1: slad du mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yang skrag par 'gyur lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458a-2: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-4: yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-5: mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yang gzhan pa ni ma lags kyi /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-6: mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi mtha' gang lags
K10D0118_H0121:458a-7: pa'i mtha' de nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' lags la
K10D0118_H0121:458a-8: / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang lags pa de'ang chos thams cad kyi mtha' lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-9: de'i slad du mi skrag lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458a-10: chos thams cad yang dag par ma bsgrubs pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-13: ci'i phyir na 'di rdo rje'i gzhi zhes bya /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-16: chos thams cad ni mi phyed pa lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-17: de'i slad du 'di rdo rje'i gzhi lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad
K10D0118_H0121:458a-19: du chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di
K10D0118_H0121:458a-20: ni rdo rje'i gzhi lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-21: ci'i slad du rdo rje'i gzhi zhes bgyi zhe na /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-22: chos thams cad sems ma mchis pa'i slad du lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458a-23: chos thams cad byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-24: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-25: chos thams cad brjod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste /
K10D0118_H0121:458a-26: 'di na ming gang dang gang gis chos gang dang
K10D0118_H0121:458a-27: gang brjod pa'i chos de dang de chos de dang
K10D0118_H0121:458a-28: de la ma mchis lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458b-0: gang ma mchis pa de ni stong pa @458b lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458b-1: gang stong pa de ni med pa lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458b-2: gang med pa de ni brjod pa'i rngo mi thogs pa lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458b-3: brjod du ma mchis pa de ni byang chub lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:458b-5: 'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458b-6: chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:458b-7: 'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458b-9: ci'i phyir rdo rje'i gzhi zhes bya /
K10D0118_H0121:458b-12: chos thams cad ni rang gi yul las dben pa lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:458b-17: dge slong kun dga' bo de'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun 'dzin par 'gyur na /
K10D0118_H0121:458b-23: bdag gis ni yi ge gcig kyang bstan par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags na /
K10D0118_H0121:458b-24: mang po lta ga la mthong lags /
K10D0118_H0121:458b-28: 'jam dpal khyod 'di skad du 'chad pa ni khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par smras pa yin te /
K10D0118_H0121:458b-31: ngas ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu
K10D0118_H0121:458b-32: med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0118_H0121:458b-33: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
K10D0118_H0121:459a-0: rnams chos nyid 'di kho na ston cing bzhugs @459a
K10D0118_H0121:459a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rang gi gnas khang nas byung nas /
K10D0118_H0121:459a-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang ga la
K10D0118_H0121:459a-4: ba der song ste phyin nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
K10D0118_H0121:459a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang ga la ba der song nas /
K10D0118_H0121:459a-7: bzhugs khang gi phyi sgo na 'greng ba dang /
K10D0118_H0121:459a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0118_H0121:459a-11: dge slong sh'a ri'i bu 'di gnas khang gi phyi sgo na 'greng ste; chos nyan par 'dod na /
K10D0118_H0121:459a-13: sh'a ri'i bu chos nyan par nang du 'ong bar gyis shig /
K10D0118_H0121:459a-15: mtha' 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' lags na /
K10D0118_H0121:459a-16: gang gi slad rol dang; nang dang gnyis ka ma mchis par gda' lags sam /
K10D0118_H0121:459a-22: de lta lags pas yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma mchis pa lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:459a-23: de lta bu'i mtha' gang lags pa de la ni tshur mchi ba'am /
K10D0118_H0121:459a-24: phar mchi ba ma mchis te /
K10D0118_H0121:459a-26: de lta bu'i mtha' can gyi btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu de ni tshur mchi ba'am /
K10D0118_H0121:459a-27: nang du mchi ba'i mi rigs lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:459a-30: gal te nga gnas khang gi nang na nyan thos dag dang lhan cig /
K10D0118_H0121:459b-1: khyod ni phyi rol na 'dug ste /
K10D0118_H0121:459b-2: nang du 'ong du'ang mi dbang na ci khyod sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur ram /
K10D0118_H0121:459b-6: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0118_H0121:459b-7: chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du ste /
K10D0118_H0121:459b-8: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod pa gang lags pa 'di'ang chos kyi dbyings lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:459b-9: mtshan nyid gcig pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang
K10D0118_H0121:459b-10: gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma lags so
K10D0118_H0121:459b-11: // chos sam chos bstan pa zhes bgyi ba'am /
K10D0118_H0121:459b-12: chos nyan pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di dag kyang
K10D0118_H0121:459b-13: gnyis su ma mchis pa'i slad du tha dad pa
K10D0118_H0121:459b-14: ma mchis te / de'i slad du'ang chos kyi dbyings las tha dad pa ma lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:459b-16: zhes bgyi ba'i yi ge gang lags pa 'di dag kyang chos kyi dbyings su gtogs te /
K10D0118_H0121:459b-18: rnam grangs des na bdag cung zad kyang gdung ba ma mchis lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:459b-20: bskal pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du chos ston du lags kyang bdag der mchi'ang mi mchi /
K10D0118_H0121:459b-22: yongs su gdung ba'ang mi skyed lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:459b-23: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0118_H0121:459b-25: gnyis shig mchis na ni dga' ba'am /
K10D0118_H0121:459b-26: yongs su gdung ba bskyed par 'gyur na chos kyi dbyings de ni gnyis su ma mchis te /
K10D0118_H0121:460a-2: yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:460a-4: chos ston pa mdzad pa'i chos bstan pa des kyang chos gang yang gsog pa'am /
K10D0118_H0121:460a-8: 'di ltar chos bstan pa de ni chos gang yang dmigs pas nye bar gnas pa ma lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:460a-10: de'i slad du'ang bdag dga' bar mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:460a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0118_H0121:460a-12: sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa thos sam /
K10D0118_H0121:460a-18: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa thos kyang ci ma rung snyam ste /
K10D0118_H0121:460a-19: de'i slad du bdag 'di na mchis lags so //
K10D0118_H0121:460a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0118_H0121:460a-22: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nang na mchi bar mdzad du gsol /
K10D0118_H0121:460a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad du /
K10D0118_H0121:460a-24: sh'a ri'i bu khyod gnas khang gi nang du shog ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0118_H0121:460a-25: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gnas khang du 'ongs nas /
K10D0118_H0121:460b-0: bcom @460b ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10D0118_H0121:460b-2: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'jam dpal
K10D0118_H0121:460b-3: gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces smras so; ;btsun
K10D0118_H0121:460b-4: pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod don gyi dbang gang mthong
K10D0118_H0121:460b-7: kho bo ni chos nyan par 'dod pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs te /
K10D0118_H0121:460b-8: 'di ltar gang na bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10D0118_H0121:460b-9: skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu gnas pa de
K10D0118_H0121:460b-10: na bstan pa zab mo yang dag phul du byung
K10D0118_H0121:460b-11: ba yod de / de'i phyir kho bo 'ongs so //
K10D0118_H0121:460b-14: de ni de bzhin te bstan pa 'di ni zab bo //
K10D0118_H0121:460b-16: bcom ldan 'das nyid dang thabs gcig tu brtsams pa'i chos bstan pa de ji tsam du zab /
K10D0118_H0121:460b-18: de ni btsun pa sh'a ri'i bus rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
K10D0118_H0121:460b-19: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin no //
K10D0118_H0121:460b-21: 'di ltar chos bstan pa 'di ni so so'i skye
K10D0118_H0121:460b-22: bo'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin; dgra bcom pa
K10D0118_H0121:460b-23: nyid kyi chos la zhugs pa ma yin /
K10D0118_H0121:460b-24: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ma yin /
K10D0118_H0121:460b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0118_H0121:460b-26: 'di ni chos gang dmigs pa'i phyir yang zhugs pa ma yin no //
K10D0118_H0121:460b-27: 'di ni gang du zhugs pa'am ldog pa'ang med de /
K10D0118_H0121:460b-28: chos thams cad shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0118_H0121:461a-2: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin zhes de skad smra /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-5: dgra bcom pa nyid ni 'dod chags dang /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-7: gti mug zad pa yin na de gang gi snod
K10D0118_H0121:461a-8: yin zhing de gang ji lta bu zhig gi snod
K10D0118_H0121:461a-10: de las bsams nas dgra bcom pa zag pa zad
K10D0118_H0121:461a-11: pa chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin no zhes
K10D0118_H0121:461a-15: kho bo ni chos bstan pa 'di'i don du gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-16: gnas khang nas gnas khang dang /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-17: phug nas phug tu khyod 'tshol te /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-18: bdag gis khyod las zab pa zab pa yang dag
K10D0118_H0121:461a-19: pa'i spobs pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos kyang
K10D0118_H0121:461a-22: kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-23: khyod kyi chos bstan pa la chog mi shes so //
K10D0118_H0121:461a-26: khyod chos bstan pas chog mi shes sam /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-28: kho bo chog mi shes so //
K10D0118_H0121:461a-30: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu ci /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-31: chos kyi dbyings chos 'tshol bar byed dam /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-36: chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan la /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-37: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-38: gzhan pa ni ma yin na ci'i phyir /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-39: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
K10D0118_H0121:461a-40: chos mnyan pa la chog mi shes /
K10D0118_H0121:461b-0: @461b chos kyi dbyings ni chos 'tshol bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0118_H0121:461b-1: gal te de 'tshol bar byed na ni de'i phyir
K10D0118_H0121:461b-2: da chog shes par 'gyur ba zhig na gang gi
K10D0118_H0121:461b-3: phyir tshol bar mi byed pa de'i phyir chog mi
K10D0118_H0121:461b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par kho bo lta
K10D0118_H0121:461b-7: bu chos nyan pa de lta bu khyod kyis ga
K10D0118_H0121:461b-9: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod sh'a ri'i bu yongs
K10D0118_H0121:461b-10: su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can yin
K10D0118_H0121:461b-16: chos thams cad yongs su ma grub pas na kho
K10D0118_H0121:461b-17: bo'ang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos
K10D0118_H0121:461b-18: can yin no snyam du de ltar mos so //
K10D0118_H0121:461b-20: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod shi 'pho med pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:461b-21: skye ba med pa'i chos can yin par mos sam /
K10D0118_H0121:461b-27: chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa'i phyir te /
K10D0118_H0121:461b-28: chos kyi dbyings la 'chi 'pho'am skye ba med pa de ltar mos so //
K10D0118_H0121:461b-30: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod dgra bcom pa zag
K10D0118_H0121:461b-31: pa zad pa mi shes pa dang ldan par mos
K10D0118_H0121:461b-38: mi shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir dgra bcom
K10D0118_H0121:461b-39: pa zag pa zad pa mi shes pa dang ldan
K10D0118_H0121:461b-40: te 'di ltar mi shes pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:461b-41: shes pa ni mi zad pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir dben pa ste /
K10D0118_H0121:461b-42: de bas na mi shes pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:462a-0: shes par rnam par mi rtog @462a *//
K10D0118_H0121:462a-1: pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa mi shes pa dang ldan par mos so /
K10D0118_H0121:462a-3: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa /
K10D0118_H0121:462a-4: shes pa dang bral bar mos sam /
K10D0118_H0121:462a-10: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid dang bral ba ste /
K10D0118_H0121:462a-11: de bas na dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa shes pa dang bral bar mos so //
K10D0118_H0121:462a-13: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod dgra bcom pa zag
K10D0118_H0121:462a-14: pa zad pa rnam par ma grol ba'i chos can
K10D0118_H0121:462a-19: nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir te /
K10D0118_H0121:462a-20: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa med na gang dag las rnam par grol bar 'gyur te /
K10D0118_H0121:462a-23: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod sngon gyi de bzhin
K10D0118_H0121:462a-24: gshegs pa rnams ma byung zhing yongs su mya ngan
K10D0118_H0121:462a-32: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la ni skye ba med de /
K10D0118_H0121:462a-33: gang mi skye ba de la mi snang bar 'gyur ba'am /
K10D0118_H0121:462a-34: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ga la yod de de ltar mos so //
K10D0118_H0121:462a-36: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod sangs rgyas thams cad gcig yin par mos sam /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-0: chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad pa med @462b pa de de ltar mos so //
K10D0118_H0121:462b-2: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K10D0118_H0121:462b-3: thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yin par mos
K10D0118_H0121:462b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni mi zad pa nyid kyi zhing yin te de ltar mos so //
K10D0118_H0121:462b-11: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod chos thams cad yongs
K10D0118_H0121:462b-12: su shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang; spang
K10D0118_H0121:462b-13: bar bya ba ma yin pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-14: mngon sum du bya ba ma yin pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-15: bsgom par bya ba ma yin par mos sam /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-22: ngo bo nyid kyis ngo bo nyid yongs su mi shes pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-23: rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin spong ba dang /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-24: mngon sum du mi byed pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-25: sgom par mi byed pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-26: skyed par mi byed pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-28: len par mi byed pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-30: mtha' de ni mi gnas pa nyid de /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-33: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod chos kyi dbyings ni phung por mi 'dug pa'i dbyings yin pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-36: chos gang yang phung por 'dug pa med par mos sam /
K10D0118_H0121:462b-45: phung por 'dug pa de mi dmigs te de ltar mos so //
K10D0118_H0121:463a-0: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod shes rab @463a *//
K10D0118_H0121:463a-1: gang yin pa de chos kyi dbyings yin la /
K10D0118_H0121:463a-2: chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de shes rab yin te /
K10D0118_H0121:463a-3: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'i ming yang thob pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:463a-4: de'i phyir yang dgra bcom pa zhes bya bar mos sam /
K10D0118_H0121:463a-11: rtogs par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyis dgra bcom pa
K10D0118_H0121:463a-12: nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings
K10D0118_H0121:463a-13: yongs su shes par zad kyi /
K10D0118_H0121:463a-14: chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes pa ni 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid dam /
K10D0118_H0121:463a-15: zhe sdang gi bdag nyid dam /
K10D0118_H0121:463a-16: gti mug gi bdag nyid kyang ma yin la /
K10D0118_H0121:463a-17: chos kyi dbyings las kyang dgra bcom pa gud na med de de ltar mos so //
K10D0118_H0121:463a-19: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang mnyam par mos sam /
K10D0118_H0121:463a-26: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ni chos thams cad
K10D0118_H0121:463a-27: rang bzhin gyis dben par mngon par rdzogs par sangs
K10D0118_H0121:463a-28: rgyas te / de ltar mos so //
K10D0118_H0121:463a-30: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyi yul ji tsam
K10D0118_H0121:463a-31: pa de tsam du khyod kyis lan btab pa legs
K10D0118_H0121:463a-33: de tsam zhig khyod la dris kyi /
K10D0118_H0121:463a-34: da ni rang gi gnas su song zhig /
K10D0118_H0121:463a-37: 'di ltar 'di nyid ni bdag gi ji srid 'tsho'i bar gyi gnas yin no //
K10D0118_H0121:463b-0: de nas bcom @463b ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0118_H0121:463b-2: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am /
K10D0118_H0121:463b-5: kun chub par byed pa des ni spobs pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0118_H0121:463b-8: de ni de ltar lags te /
K10D0118_H0121:463b-9: ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am
K10D0118_H0121:463b-10: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi slad du chos
K10D0118_H0121:463b-11: kyi phyag rgya 'di bzhag pa de dag ni sngon
K10D0118_H0121:463b-12: gyi rgyal ba rnams la bgyi ba bgyis pa lags
K10D0118_H0121:463b-13: te / de dag de ltar rig par bya'o //
K10D0118_H0121:463b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0118_H0121:463b-16: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10D0118_H0121:463b-18: de skad ces gsol pa dang; bcom ldan 'das kyis
K10D0118_H0121:463b-19: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad
K10D0118_H0121:463b-22: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam
K10D0118_H0121:463b-23: dpal gzhon nur gyur pas zhus nas ngas lan btab
K10D0118_H0121:463b-24: pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /
K10D0118_H0121:463b-25: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K10D0118_H0121:463b-26: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0118_H0121:463b-27: rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig; sh'a ri'i bu /
K10D0118_H0121:463b-28: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:463b-31: kun chub par byad pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:464a-1: la brtson par gnas pa de dag ni rin po che dang 'dra ba yin te /
K10D0118_H0121:464a-2: mi skye ba'i chos rnams la'ang bzong pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0118_H0121:464a-3: gzhan dag la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0118_H0121:464a-4: chos nyung du kun chub par byas pas kyang chos mang po ston par 'gyur ro //
K10D0118_H0121:464a-5: spobs pa mi chod par yang 'gyur ro //
K10D0118_H0121:464a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0118_H0121:464a-7: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10D0118_H0121:464a-8: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10D0118_H0121:464a-12: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0118_H0121:464a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0118_H0121:464a-14: 'phags pa rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0118_H0121:464a-15: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a barma dang /
K10D0118_H0121:464a-16: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde
